LoginPage.subTitle: Login to your account
LoginPage.prototypeDescription: This is a temporary quick login for prototype demonstration.

FarmerDashboardPage.title: Dashboard | Farmer Portal
FarmerDashboardPage.description: View announcements and advisories from KVK.
FarmerDashboardPage.advisoryDescription: Important updates regarding crop management and weather conditions. Includes advisories from KVK and external bulletins scraped from official KVK websites.
FarmerDashboardPage.announcementsDescription: Latest updates and information from KVK.

SupplyProductsPage.page_description: Add new products or manage existing inventory.

FarmerAskQueryPage.metadata_title: Ask KVK & View Queries | Farmer Portal
FarmerAskQueryPage.ask_kvk_description: Have a question about farming practices, schemes, or need advice? Submit it here.
FarmerAskQueryPage.query_history_description: Review the status and answers to your previously submitted questions.

FarmerCartPage.page_description: Review your selected items before proceeding (checkout not implemented).

FarmerShopPage.page_description: Find the supplies you need for your farm. Add items to your cart.

FarmerTrainingPage.available_programs_description: Browse upcoming training sessions and register to enhance your skills.
FarmerTrainingPage.registered_programs_description: Review the training programs you have registered for.

KVKQueriesPage.page_description: Review questions submitted by farmers and provide answers.

KVKTrainingPage.page_description: Create new training sessions, update existing ones, and view farmer registrations.

AnnouncementForm.errorDescription: Failed to post announcement. Please try again.

CropWeatherAdvisoryForm.advisoryDescription: Post important warnings or advice regarding current crop conditions and weather forecasts. This will be prominently displayed to farmers.
CropWeatherAdvisoryForm.placeholderText: Enter the crop and weather advisory details here...
CropWeatherAdvisoryForm.errorDescriptionGeneral: Failed to update advisory. Please try again.

DisplayAdvisory.kvkAdvisoryErrorDescription: Could not load the KVK advisory. Please try again later.
DisplayAdvisory.noKvkAdvisoryDescription: There is currently no active crop or weather advisory manually posted by KVK.
DisplayAdvisory.externalBulletinsDescription: Links to weather bulletins fetched from official KVK websites.
DisplayAdvisory.noBulletinsFoundDescription: Could not automatically fetch weather bulletins from external sources.
DisplayAdvisory.availablePdfBulletinsCardDescription: Click to open an external bulletin. Showing top {count} bulletins found.

ExistingAnnouncements.noAnnouncementsDescription: There are currently no general announcements posted.
ExistingAnnouncements.kvkPrompt: Use the form above to post a new announcement.
ExistingAnnouncements.farmerPrompt: Check back later for updates from KVK.
